name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Basic principles of fluid motion and flow behavior.

lessons.name: Bernoulli's Principle
lessons.description: Understanding Bernoulli's equation and its applications.

lessons.name: Continuity Equation
lessons.description: Mass conservation in fluid flow systems.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Properties and behavior of subsonic airflow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Phenomena
lessons.description: Understanding shock waves and supersonic flow patterns.

lessons.name: Compressibility Effects
lessons.description: Impact of air compressibility on high-speed flight.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Conduction, convection, and radiation in aerodynamic heating.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Design and materials for spacecraft thermal protection.

lessons.name: Re-entry Heating Analysis
lessons.description: Calculating and managing heat loads during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Properties and selection of aerospace materials.

lessons.name: Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding forces and stresses in spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Structural Testing
lessons.description: Testing methods for validating spacecraft structural integrity.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws
lessons.description: Fundamental laws governing orbital motion.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers
lessons.description: Hohmann transfers and orbital maneuvering techniques.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: Trajectory design and mission optimization strategies.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Systems Integration
lessons.description: Integrating various spacecraft subsystems effectively.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Spacecraft electrical power generation and distribution.

lessons.name: Communication Systems
lessons.description: Spacecraft communication and data transmission systems.

name: Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry
description: Introduction to organic compounds, structures, and basic reactions.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbon Structures
lessons.description: Understanding alkanes, alkenes, and alkynes structures.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Identification and properties of common functional groups.

lessons.name: Isomerism
lessons.description: Structural and stereoisomerism in organic compounds.

name: Organic Reaction Mechanisms
description: Understanding how organic reactions occur and predicting products.

lessons.name: Nucleophilic Substitution
lessons.description: SN1 and SN2 reaction mechanisms and factors affecting them.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: E1 and E2 elimination mechanisms and stereochemistry.

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Electrophilic and nucleophilic addition to multiple bonds.

name: Spectroscopy and Structure Determination
description: Using spectroscopic methods to determine organic compound structures.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: 1H and 13C NMR techniques for structure elucidation.

lessons.name: IR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Infrared spectroscopy for functional group identification.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Using mass spectrometry for molecular weight and structure determination.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of metal complexes, ligands, and coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Metal-Ligand Bonding
lessons.description: Understanding coordination bonds and complex formation.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Electronic structure and properties of transition metal complexes.

lessons.name: Coordination Geometries
lessons.description: Common coordination geometries and their stability.

name: Solid State Chemistry
description: Properties and structures of inorganic solids and materials.

lessons.name: Crystal Structures
lessons.description: Understanding unit cells and crystal lattices.

lessons.name: Defects in Solids
lessons.description: Point defects, dislocations, and their effects on properties.

lessons.name: Electronic Properties
lessons.description: Band theory and electronic behavior in inorganic materials.

name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: Role of inorganic elements in biological systems.

lessons.name: Metalloproteins
lessons.description: Structure and function of metal-containing proteins.

lessons.name: Enzyme Catalysis
lessons.description: Inorganic cofactors in enzymatic reactions.

lessons.name: Metal Transport
lessons.description: Mechanisms of metal ion transport in biological systems.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Laws of thermodynamics and their applications to chemical systems.

lessons.name: First Law of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Energy conservation and enthalpy in chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Second Law and Entropy
lessons.description: Entropy, spontaneity, and the direction of chemical processes.

lessons.name: Gibbs Free Energy
lessons.description: Chemical equilibrium and reaction spontaneity prediction.

name: Quantum Mechanics and Atomic Structure
description: Quantum mechanical description of atoms and molecules.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of quantum mechanics.

lessons.name: Schrödinger Equation
lessons.description: Solving the wave equation for simple systems.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbitals
lessons.description: Electronic structure and bonding in molecules.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Rate Laws and Orders
lessons.description: Determining reaction orders and rate constants.

lessons.name: Activation Energy
lessons.description: Arrhenius equation and temperature dependence of rates.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: Homogeneous and heterogeneous catalytic mechanisms.

name: Elvish Languages: Sindarin and Quenya
description: Comprehensive study of the two main Elvish languages.

lessons.name: Sindarin Grammar
lessons.description: Grammatical structures and syntax of the Grey-elven tongue.

lessons.name: Quenya Phonology
lessons.description: Sound system and pronunciation of the High-elven language.

lessons.name: Elvish Poetry and Prose
lessons.description: Literary forms and stylistic features in Elvish texts.

name: Dwarvish and Khuzdul
description: The secret language of the Dwarves and its cultural significance.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Phonetics
lessons.description: Sound patterns and pronunciation in the Dwarvish language.

lessons.name: Runic Scripts
lessons.description: Reading and writing Dwarvish runes and inscriptions.

lessons.name: Cultural Context
lessons.description: The role of language in Dwarvish society and traditions.

name: Ancient Scripts and Inscriptions
description: Deciphering historical texts and monuments of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Tengwar Script
lessons.description: The Elvish writing system and its various modes.

lessons.name: Historical Inscriptions
lessons.description: Analysis of ancient texts and their historical significance.

lessons.name: Palaeographic Methods
lessons.description: Techniques for dating and authenticating ancient manuscripts.

name: Foundations of Inter-species Relations
description: Historical development of relationships between the Free Peoples.

lessons.name: The Elder Days
lessons.description: Early alliances and conflicts in the First Age.

lessons.name: Rise of Númenor
lessons.description: The golden age of Men and their relationship with Elves.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance
lessons.description: Unity against the Shadow and its lasting impact.

name: Diplomatic Institutions and Practices
description: Formal and informal diplomatic mechanisms in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The White Council
lessons.description: Structure and decision-making processes of the Wise.

lessons.name: Royal Courts and Embassies
lessons.description: Diplomatic protocols between kingdoms and realms.

lessons.name: Treaty Making
lessons.description: Formal agreements and their enforcement mechanisms.

name: Crisis Management and Conflict Resolution
description: Handling diplomatic crises and preventing warfare.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: Case study in multi-party crisis negotiation.

lessons.name: Mediation Techniques
lessons.description: Role of neutral parties in resolving disputes.

lessons.name: Post-War Reconstruction
lessons.description: Rebuilding relationships and trust after conflict.
